name: Serious Cheese: Grilled Kimcheeze Sandwiches
description: It's only natural that someone who loves stinky, funky cheeses might turn to making her own stinky, funky kimchi—deliciously spicy cabbage pickled in the Korean tradition. Kimchi and cheese are two of my favorite foods so it was only a matter of time before they came to share a common home on my plate: the grilled sandwich.
recipeIngredient: 2 to 3 ounces mild cheddar cheese curds

recipeInstructions.text: Heat a flat griddle or good heavy pan to medium-high heat, adding a touch of oil or butter if necessary. Assemble your sandwich.
Griddle evenly on both sides until the bread is a crusty golden brown and the cheese starts to ooze out of the sides. Devour greedily.
